metaTitle: ALBA VERDE Jacarilla | 3 Bed Apartments From €158,500
metaDescription: ALBA VERDE Jacarilla: Modern 3-bedroom apartments from €158,500. Delivered Dec 2025 by COSTA BLANCA BOLUS. 40% less than island markets.

content.heroIntro: ALBA VERDE represents an exceptional opportunity in Jacarilla, a charming pueblo community in the heart of Alicante's Costa Blanca. Developed by the trusted COSTA BLANCA BOLUS team, this collection of modern apartments combines contemporary design with genuine affordability—offering 3-bedroom homes from just €158,500, a remarkable 40% below comparable Spanish island markets. Each property is meticulously crafted with premium specifications and scheduled for delivery on December 1st, 2025, making this an ideal choice for families, investors, and expats seeking authentic Spanish living without compromise. Whether you're drawn to the established international community, the proximity to championship golf courses, or the white sand beaches just 20 minutes away, ALBA VERDE positions you perfectly to embrace Costa Blanca living.

locationSection.intro: Jacarilla is a vibrant pueblo that captures the authentic essence of inland Costa Blanca living. This established community has evolved into a preferred destination for international buyers seeking genuine Spanish lifestyle without the overcrowding of coastal tourist zones. The area boasts excellent healthcare facilities, quality education options including international schools with British curriculum, and a thriving expat community where English is widely spoken. Jacarilla's central location provides strategic access to both the Mediterranean's most beautiful beaches and Spain's finest golf destinations, while local markets and supermarkets ensure convenient daily living.
highlights: Beach: Multiple Blue Flag beaches within 20 minutes
Hospital: Regional hospital within 30 minutes, English-speaking doctors
Shopping: Mercadona, Lidl, Consum, local markets
Restaurants: Diverse dining from traditional Spanish to international cuisine

propertyFeatures.intro: ALBA VERDE apartments are constructed to the highest standards, reflecting COSTA BLANCA BOLUS's commitment to quality and value. Each property features modern thermal efficiency, premium finishes, and thoughtfully designed spaces that maximize comfort and natural light. Built using contemporary materials and proven construction techniques, these homes are designed to perform beautifully for decades while minimizing energy costs—a critical consideration for permanent residents and investors alike.
features: Private/communal swimming pool with landscaped surroundings
Double glazing with thermal break for energy efficiency
Quality ceramic flooring in all areas
Modern bathroom fixtures with shower enclosures

content.investmentSection: ALBA VERDE represents a compelling investment in one of Costa Blanca's most dynamic markets. Property values in Jacarilla are experiencing consistent growth at +8% year-on-year, driven by increased international interest and infrastructure improvements. The rental market remains robust, with similar properties commanding €800 per week in the seasonal rental market, offering excellent income potential for investors. At 40% below the pricing of comparable properties in Spanish island markets, ALBA VERDE delivers exceptional value. The combination of affordable entry pricing, strong appreciation trends, reliable rental demand, and the established expat community creates a perfect storm for long-term capital growth and income generation.
whyBuySection: Strategic pueblo location balancing authentic living with modern convenience
Trusted developer: COSTA BLANCA BOLUS with proven track record
Exceptional value: 40% below Spanish island market prices
Strong investment fundamentals: +8% annual appreciation trend
Established international community with English commonly spoken
Easy access to multiple Blue Flag beaches within 20 minutes
Championship golf courses nearby for enthusiasts

faqs.question: What is the price of properties in ALBA VERDE?
faqs.answer: ALBA VERDE apartments start from €158,500 for 3-bedroom, 2-bathroom units with 74-79m² built area. Current availability includes 3 units ready for purchase. Contact us for detailed pricing and current inventory.

faqs.question: When will ALBA VERDE be completed?
faqs.answer: ALBA VERDE will be delivered on December 1st, 2025. COSTA BLANCA BOLUS provides a comprehensive 10-year structural warranty. We can provide specific delivery schedules and completion timelines upon request.

faqs.question: Who is the developer of ALBA VERDE?
faqs.answer: COSTA BLANCA BOLUS is the developer—an established builder with a proven track record constructing quality homes throughout Jacarilla and surrounding areas. They prioritize customer satisfaction and structural excellence.

faqs.question: Is Jacarilla a good place to buy property?
faqs.answer: Yes, absolutely. Jacarilla offers an established international community where English is commonly spoken, property values are appreciating at +8% annually, and amenities include a regional hospital within 30 minutes and multiple Blue Flag beaches within 20 minutes. It's ideal for families, retirees, and investors.

faqs.question: How far is ALBA VERDE from the beach?
faqs.answer: ALBA VERDE is just 20 minutes from multiple beautiful Blue Flag beaches along the Costa Blanca coast, perfect for weekend getaways while maintaining peaceful pueblo living.

faqs.question: What amenities are near ALBA VERDE?
faqs.answer: Nearby amenities include major supermarkets (Mercadona, Lidl, Consum), a regional hospital with English-speaking doctors within 30 minutes, several championship golf courses, and international schools offering British curriculum education.

faqs.question: Can I rent out my ALBA VERDE apartment?
faqs.answer: Yes, the rental market for similar properties in the area is strong, with comparable units achieving approximately €800 per week during peak seasons, making ALBA VERDE an excellent investment property.

faqs.question: Is ALBA VERDE suitable for families?
faqs.answer: ALBA VERDE is ideal for families with its 3-bedroom, 2-bathroom layout, communal pool, secure video entry system, and proximity to international schools, healthcare facilities, and recreational activities.

content.conclusion: ALBA VERDE represents far more than a property purchase—it's an investment in a lifestyle grounded in authentic Spanish culture, Mediterranean beauty, and genuine value. With pricing 40% below comparable island markets, +8% annual appreciation, strong rental potential, and delivery in December 2025, this development checks every box for discerning buyers. COSTA BLANCA BOLUS has created something special in Jacarilla: modern, affordable apartments in a thriving international community with world-class amenities minutes away. Whether you're seeking a permanent residence, a vacation retreat, or an investment property, ALBA VERDE delivers exceptional opportunity. Don't miss this chance to secure your piece of Costa Blanca at today's prices. Contact us via WhatsApp for a detailed viewing schedule, current availability, and personalized property recommendations.
